sentences.en: All the contributors were of African descent.
sentences.cn: 所有的撰稿人都是非裔人士。

sentences.en: Carol O'Neil is of Irish descent.
sentences.cn: 卡罗尔·奥尼尔有爱尔兰血统.

sentences.en: He yearned for wearing a set of descent vesture in front of female schoolmates.
sentences.cn: 他渴望穿一身体面的衣裳站在女同学的面前。

sentences.en: It increased slightly from 1979 to 1983, and then resumed its descent.
sentences.cn: 从1979年到1983年这一比例略有上升, 而后又开始下降.

sentences.en: Passengers must fasten their seat belts prior to descent.
sentences.cn: 乘客在飞机降落之前必须系好安全带。

sentences.en: She is Hungarian by descent.
sentences.cn: 她祖籍是匈牙利.

sentences.en: She is of German descent.
sentences.cn: 她祖籍是德国.

sentences.en: She started a chary descent of the stairs.
sentences.cn: 她开始小心翼翼地下楼梯.

sentences.en: Sixteen of the youngsters set off for help, but during the descent three collapsed in the cold and rain.
sentences.cn: 16名年轻人出发去寻求帮助，但在下山过程中有3人因寒冷和大雨晕倒了。

sentences.en: The authors show how this was triggered by his belief in the common descent of all humans.
sentences.cn: 作者表明，这张图是如何由他的信仰引发出来的，达尔文相信全人类属于共同的血统。

sentences.en: The descent of the mountain took nearly two hours.
sentences.cn: 下山差不多花了两个小时.

sentences.en: The descent of the mountain took two hours.
sentences.cn: 下山花了两个小时.

sentences.en: The emperor claimed descent from David.
sentences.cn: 这个皇帝自称是大卫王的后代。

sentences.en: The marriage was considered especially ignominious since she was of royal descent.
sentences.cn: 由于她出身王族,这门婚事被认为是奇耻大辱.

sentences.en: The only lasting solution lies in a political settlement. Without it, their descent into chaos will be guaranteed.
sentences.cn: 唯一的长久之计是通过政治手段解决。否则，他们势必会陷入一片混乱。

sentences.en: The plane began its descent to Heathrow.
sentences.cn: 飞机开始向希思罗机场降落。

sentences.en: There is a gradual descent to the sea.
sentences.cn: 有一片斜坡缓缓伸延到海边。

sentences.en: We watched anxiously during her descent from the tree.
sentences.cn: 我们焦急地看着她从树上爬下来.

sentences.en: When entering a trail or starting a descent, yield to other skiers.
sentences.cn: 进入滑雪道或开始下滑时，要给其他滑雪者让路。

sentences.en: young men and women of Asian descent
sentences.cn: 亚裔男女青年

words.tran_cn: 下降物；下降者；下行字母
下降；下去；下来；遗传；屈尊

phrases.tran_cn: 最速下降法；最陡下降法

trans.tran_cn: 下降，斜坡，恶化，沦落，血统
trans.tran_en: your family origins, especially your nationality or relationship to someone important who lived a long time ago

trans.tran_cn: 除去…的气味；使…失去香味
